languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс умолкает, а потом, не выдержав, бросает на вас еще один взгляд, полный смятения.{/n} "Я... хотел бы... я навещу вас после брифинга лично. У меня... есть вопросы".

{n}He stops, then his facade of sangfroid cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс умолкает, а потом, не выдержав, бросает на вас еще один взгляд, полный смятения.{/n} "Я... хотел бы... я навещу вас после брифинга лично. У меня... есть вопросы".

traits.locale_text: {n}He stops, then his facade of collectedness cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

{n}He stops, then his facade of collectedness cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

{n}He stops, then his facade of sangfroid cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

{n}He stops, then his facade of sangfroid cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

{n}He stops, then his facade of sangfroid cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

languages.text: {n}他停了下来，冷静的面具裂开了。他再次看了你一眼，目光中充满了躁动。{/n}“我希望……能在……会议之后，与你私下里见个面。我有些……问题要问。”
languages.original_text: {n}He stops, then his facade of sangfroid cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}他停了下来，冷静的面具裂开了。他再次看了你一眼，目光中充满了躁动。{/n}“我希望……能在……会议之后，与你私下里见个面。我有些……问题要问。”

languages.text: {n}Er hält dann inne, dann bröckelt seine Fassade der Gelassenheit und er blickt dich erneut an, diesmal völlig aufgewühlt.{/n} "Es ... wäre mir lieber ... Wir würden uns nach dem Briefing in Ruhe treffen. Ich habe ... Fragen."
languages.original_text: {n}He stops, then his facade of sangfroid cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er hält dann inne, dann bröckelt seine Fassade der Gelassenheit und er blickt dich erneut an, diesmal völlig aufgewühlt.{/n} "Es ... wäre mir lieber ... Wir würden uns nach dem Briefing in Ruhe treffen. Ich habe ... Fragen."

languages.text: {n}Il se fige, puis sa façade de sang-froid se craquèle. Le regard qu'il vous lance ensuite n'exprime plus qu'un profond tourment.{/n} « Je... préférerais... Je viendrai vous voir après la réunion. J'ai... des questions à vous poser. »
languages.original_text: {n}He stops, then his facade of sangfroid cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il se fige, puis sa façade de sang-froid se craquèle. Le regard qu'il vous lance ensuite n'exprime plus qu'un profond tourment.{/n} « Je... préférerais... Je viendrai vous voir après la réunion. J'ai... des questions à vous poser. »

languages.text: {n}Se detiene, su apariencia de sangre fría se esfuma y te lanza otra mirada mucho más preocupada.{/n} «Me... gustaría... reunirme personalmente con usted tras este informe. Tengo... preguntas».
languages.original_text: {n}He stops, then his facade of sangfroid cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se detiene, su apariencia de sangre fría se esfuma y te lanza otra mirada mucho más preocupada.{/n} «Me... gustaría... reunirme personalmente con usted tras este informe. Tengo... preguntas».

languages.text: {n}彼は立ち止まり、平静を装っていた顔が崩れ、動揺に満ちた別の表情を見せる。{/n}「わ…できれば…説明の後に、直接お会いしたいです。その…聞きたいことがあるんです」
languages.original_text: {n}He stops, then his facade of sangfroid cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は立ち止まり、平静を装っていた顔が崩れ、動揺に満ちた別の表情を見せる。{/n}「わ…できれば…説明の後に、直接お会いしたいです。その…聞きたいことがあるんです」

languages.text: {n}Duraksayınca soğukkanlı tavrı çöküyor ve sana bir bakış daha atıyor. Bu kez gözlerinde telaş var.{/n} "Ben... Tercihen... Toplantıdan sonra baş başa görüşelim. Bazı... sorularım var."
languages.original_text: {n}He stops, then his facade of sangfroid cracks, and he gives you another look, this one full of turmoil.{/n} "I would... prefer... I will meet with you in person after the briefing. I have... questions."
